attributes.action: Enforce a legal limit on the levels of fat in food products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day we hear people complaining about the state of obesity in britain but what are we actually doing about it? Sure we can advise people to steer clear of fatty products but it will never prevent them from buying their favourite items at the super market. Now is the time to actually make a difference.
